about_the_game:
Welcome to Spoofs Playland!

Tiny creatures called Spoofs have come from a faraway planet to befriend humans, starting with you! In Spoofs Playland, you can play games, enjoy lots of fun activities or just relax in your room, all alongside your Spoof buddy.

Play together, raise your bond level, and discover hundreds of unlockable items, including new rooms to decorate, toys and stickers to display, and so much more!

Spoofs Playland is non-linear; drop in, choose your favorite modes, and enjoy things at your own pace. Play your favorite minigames, complete quests, or go fishing, fill in coloring pages, and write in your diary!

Collect candy, shinies, and tickets and spend them at the Shop! Unlock new rooms, different Spoofs, and a wide selection of other playful and fun collectables. Make a sparkling garden, a cozy pillow place, or mix and match. There's something for everyone!

Features

  • Minigames! Partake in a variety of fun games that vary from the tried-and-true like "Memory" and "Sliding Puzzles" to original experiences like the intense "Millypog Pop", calming "Mansion Hide-and-Seek", and more!

  • Activities for Everyone! Want to go fishing? Fill in coloring pages? Play the piano? Every corner of Spoofs Playland has something to do, whether you want to get a high-score, express your creative side, or simply relax.

  • Decorate and Customize! Spend your earnings at the Shop, where you can unlock new backgrounds, furniture, stickers, and toys! With hundreds of items to choose from, you can make a room that's uniquely yours.

  • Daily Quests and Goodies! Complete Quests from the daily quest board and earn big on missions given to you by your Spoof and other friends! Earn fun presents just by logging in, too!

  • Bond with your Spoof! Your Spoof follows you everywhere you go! As you play and spend time together, you can raise your Bond Level and become better friends, bringing special rewards and events.

  • Trophies and unlockable secrets! Earn in-game trophies as you play to unlock unique room decorations and more...

  • Learning for the whole family! A selection of robust Learn modes lets you enjoy reading, spelling, counting, arithmetic, and more, perfect for anyone who wants to reinforce early classroom subjects or master the basics!

  • English/Spanish Toggle! At the tap of a button, you can instantly swap between the two languages, both of which are fully-featured with text graphics and voices! Choose your preferred language or improve your skills by practicing in the Learn modes!

  • Immerse yourself in a hand-drawn world! Traditionally-animated art comes to life in Spoofs Playland, where every toy, every creature, every single asset is hand-crafted in gorgeous, vibrant art!

name: Spoofs Playland

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: 1.4GHz Dual-Core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 4400
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Play, paint, fish, collect and decorate! Spoofs Playland is a relaxing, family-friendly collection of point-and-click minigames where you collect decorations and bond with the adorable Spoofs. Earn rewards, complete quests, buy new backgrounds and hundreds of items, and make your ideal room!
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
